title: Who has made it to the X Factor: Celebrity live shows?
text:
V5 are among those who you’ll be seeing on the X Factor Celebrity live shows (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

X Factor Celebrity is all set to go live, with the judges having picked which acts they want to take to the next stage of the competition.

Saturday night’s show saw Simon Cowell, Louis Walsh and Nicole Scherzinger break the good news to the lucky ones, and deliver disappointment to some others – among them The Chase’s Jenny Ryan, who failed to make the cut despite impressing them the previous week.

The show will see Simon mentoring the groups, Louis the unders and Nicole the overs – with 12 acts making it through instead of the original planned nine, after Simon chose four groups for the live shows and the other judges followed suit in their categories.

But which 12 will we be watching from next Saturday night?

Here’s what you need to know…

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who has made it to the X Factor Celebrity live shows?

Here’s who made it through on Saturday night.

Groups (Simon Cowell)

Look out for rugby trio Try Star in the lives (Picture: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

Max and Harvey

V5

Try Star

Love Islanders

Unders (Louis Walsh)

Love Actually’s Olivia Olson is hoping to make a good impression for the unders (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

Jonny Labey

Kevin McHale

Olivia Olson

Megan McKenna

Overs (Nicole Scherzinger)

Victoria Ekanoye wowed the judges on Saturday night (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

Victoria Ekanoye

Ricki Lake

Martin Bashir

Vinnie Jones

Who didn’t make it through to the live shows?

Jenny Ryan didn’t make it through in Nicole Scherzinger’s category (Picture: ITV)

Only three acts missed out on the next stage – those being Brendan Cole & Jeremy Edwards, Hayley Hasselhoff and Jenny Ryan.

Nicole Scherzinger told Jenny: ‘I felt such joy when you performed yesterday, because I felt that you felt joyful.

‘Even though you have such a distinct, unique voice, I just wonder if you’re versatile enough in the live shows.

‘I can’t give you a yes. I’m so sorry, Jenny.’

When do the live shows begin?

The live shows kick off next weekend, with the winning act set to secure a record deal with Simon Cowell’s company Syco.

You can see how the acts fare next Saturday night on ITV from 8.20pm.

description: X Factor: Celebrity has its line-up for the live shows but which of the acts made it through?
